Text: Córdoba Synagogue:  It was declared a National Monument in 1885.

3:
--------------------
Text: Córdoba Synagogue:  Since then it has undergone several phases of the restoration including that of Felix Hernandez in 1929.
Triplets:<Córdoba Synagogue
4:
--------------------
Text: Córdoba Synagogue:  In 1935, the Spanish authorities marked the eight-hundredth anniversary of Maimonides' birth by changing the name of the square in which the synagogue is located to Tiberias Square, honoring the great native-born philosopher, whom is buried in Tiberias.
Triplets:< Córdoba Synagogue
5:
--------------------
Text: Córdoba Synagogue:  At this celebration the first Jewish prayer service in 443 years was held at the synagogue, openly and with full knowledge of the authorities.
Triplets:<Córdoba Synagogue
6:
--------------------
<Text: Córdoba Synagogue:  Another restoration was begun in 1977 for the reopening of the building in 1985 to celebrate the 850th anniversary of Maimonides birth.>
Triplets:<Córdoba Synagogue
